title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing a pigeon

preview.html: Today we can touch on our topic, the interpretation of a dream about stealing pigeons in a dream for single women, married women, men, pregnant women, young men, and divorced women. Follow until the end to learn everything related to this vision through the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a dove stealing a bird in a dream for a single girl. Visions: The only girl who dreams of her is a white pigeon and it was small in size or only one. The vision is an indication that the girl will enter a new project in her life. Which may be an engagement or the beginning of an engagement. Either if she saw a large number of doves in her dreams. The vision indicates that the unmarried girl will get married soon. Or if she saw a large number of doves in her dreams, this is great evidence of the husband’s generosity and the extent of his treatment of her. They will live for a long time. Life is cheerful, strong will. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is raising children, many doves in the house. This is a great sign of the coming of goodness and ample living that the dreamer will soon have, God willing. What if you dreamed of the only girl who saw a dove? Its color was black. The function of the vision is to advance One of them with her permission, which is described as reckless. Both cases: An unmarried girl sees in a dream that someone brings her a large number of white doves. He showed signs of happiness and joy in the dream. The vision indicates that the girl will live a wonderful love story. It will end in marriage, God willing. And live A happy life with the one she loves. Seeing a single girl in her dream that she is feeding pigeons on the ground. Seeing her means that she will fulfill many of the dreams that she spent her whole life searching for. See also: Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream. Interpretation of stealing pigeons in a dream for a married woman. Seeing black pigeons in a dream for a married woman It shows that her husband will betray her soon. Whether the dove is black, locked in a cage, and the married woman saw it in her dream. If the vision indicates that she will move her residence to a new place soon. Both cases see women. A married woman usually takes a bath during her sleep. This is a great sign of She will become pregnant soon. And if she sees a white slaughtered dove in her sleep, the view is indirect to the viewer. It is an indication of problems and disagreement between her and her husband, or it may be between her and her husband’s family. And if she sees a black dove in her dream, her vision indicates many problems that will lead to her separation from her husband. Or if you see a married woman dreaming of a white dove, or see her husband giving her a dove in a dream, or listening to the sound of doves, the vision has great indications of the arrival of abundant goodness and abundant livelihood. This wife will be blessed with him soon, and she and her family will live a happy life. Interpretation of seeing a dove stealing a bird in a dream For a man, its meaning is one. If a person sees pigeons in a dream, and there are large quantities of them, and they fly in the sky. The vision indicates that the dreamer has beautiful qualities, such as: his morals, kindness, generosity, and a strong personality. Likewise, seeing a man who reproduces pigeons in his house. This is interpreted in the dream as a sign of Great sustenance in the future

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of seeing a pigeon’s nest in a dream, and the interpretation of seeing pigeon eggs in a dream.

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream The dove is considered one of the favorite birds that is considered a symbol of peace and truce, and when you see it in a dream, it indicates many indicators that differ from each other for various reasons, including the color of the dove and whether it is. Alive or dead, and if he is harming you or pursuing you, and in this article we will consider in detail all the consequences and situations of this vision. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream Seeing a dove in a dream expresses mutual love, benefits, kindness, blessings, and success in all other tasks. This vision also suggests a woman Loving and just. If one sees that he is hunting pigeons with hunting rifles, this indicates that he is delving into honor and defaming chaste women. If one sees pigeons flying over him, this symbolizes the arrival of some news to him or the receipt of important events. And whoever is corrupt and witnessed playing with pigeons, this indicates Lot’s family committing sins and immorality against him. And for Nabul, if someone sees a dove in his dream, this means that his prayer will be accepted, his desire will be fulfilled, and he will reap many fruits and pleasures. If the dreamer sees that he turned to his dove, this indicates victory over his enemies and benefiting from them, and he will feel great comfort, peace and reassurance. Interpretation Seeing a dove in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin, in interpreting a dream about a dove, says that this vision shows a noble origin, a righteous lineage, and a lineage that extends to its roots. This vision also indicates the arrival of urgent and important news, or a trip for the purpose of gaining knowledge and knowledge, or delivering a trust and a message to someone. Someone. If one sees that he has a lot of pigeons, this indicates a large number of spoils and benefits, and this vision is also a reference to concubines and women. Also, seeing pigeons indicates good circumstances, harvesting money, achievement, the death of misery and illness, and a feeling of prosperity. And contentment. And for someone who is depressed, God will ease his anxiety, show his sadness, and remove despair, hopelessness and illness from his heart. If a fortuneteller sees a dove flying and then lands with it, this is an indication of the return of the absent person after a long journey or the arrival of news from a far away place. It is said that seeing pigeons being fed indicates a pimp who has abandoned religion. And follow his whims and desires. If the dreamer sees a dove in the sky, this indicates hope, desire, and supplication that God Almighty will answer. And if he sees a dove standing on his foot, then he should look at the nature of the dove itself, and if its shape is pleasing to the eyes, then this is an indication of its good and beneficial deeds. As for If it is bad in appearance and causes dissatisfaction, then this indicates the decline of work, malicious intent, and hypocrisy. Interpretation of seeing a bathroom in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a bathroom in a dream indicates the companionship she wants to meet and exchange worries and pleasures with them. If an unmarried girl sees a bathroom, this indicates her kindness and closeness to her. Comfort and God will compensate her for everything she went through and she will enter a new phase in her life in which many goals will be achieved. If she sees two doves, this indicates an emotional connection or the existence of an emotional relationship that will bring her closer to someone she loves. The vision may indicate that they are

title: Interpretation of a dream about women gathering at home according to Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about women gathering at home, which is considered one of the dreams that occupies the minds of those who see it and want to know at the moment whether it brings a certain message, a warning, or perhaps good skin. Therefore, in today’s article, we will try to provide the most important interpretations of the dream interpretation of scholars and experts in this field about this dream. Interpretation of dreams of women gathering in the house: Dreaming of women gathering in the house is a sign that a lot of food is coming. Seeing young women in a dream gathering inside the dreamer’s house is evidence of The problem ends and the pressure collapses, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a gathering of skinny women inside his house, this indicates that he is going through a period of distress and trouble in his life, and God knows best. A gathering of beautiful women in a dream in the dreamer’s house is evidence of the goodness and happiness that the dreamer will obtain and a lot of money if These ladies were plump. Women gathering in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s success in practical life and dreams coming true, and God knows best. Seeing large women gathering in a dream in the dreamer’s house is evidence of a negative change in his circumstances, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of women gathering in the house according to Ibn Sirin and says Ibn Sirin said that whoever sees in a dream women gathering inside his house, this indicates the success of the dreamer in practical life and an indication of the fulfillment of desires, and God knows best. Women gathering in the house in a dream to eat is evidence of good skin, so that a happy event will occur that will please the dreamer, and this will be The event is a reason for others to congratulate him, such as marriage, success with children, or working in a prestigious job, and God knows best. A woman gathers in a dream in the dreamer’s house, but in a state of calm or sadness, an indication of the dreamer’s poor psychological state and some of the problems he is going through, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams of women gathering at home for single women: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, and women gathering inside her house to eat, is evidence that she has reached a high position in society, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a large number of women offering her many gifts And she feels happy, it means that she has undergone a certain job and will be accepted, and God Almighty will ease her situation, and God knows best. Better. An unmarried woman who sits in a dream among many women feels pleasure and joy. It is evidence of the existence of a close relationship that satisfies relatives and family, and God knows best. Seeing unmarried women in a dream, a group of women wearing bright colored clothes and accepting them with joy, laughter and a smile, Evidence of the happiness that awaits the viewer as quickly as possible, and God knows best. The meeting of ladies in a bachelor’s house in a dream is evidence of good luck in choosing a future husband and God Almighty’s success in academic and practical life. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, and women gathering inside her house, but wearing them Black clothes and coming to her while she is screaming is evidence of the delay in her marriage, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about single female visitors: If the dreamer feels happy,

title: Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream: It indicates the good that the dreamer will gain soon and also symbolizes the huge money that the dreamer will acquire. It is one of the auspicious dreams that indicate peace of mind and herald the death of trouble and sadness. It will give you interpretations of seeing sand in a dream. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Sand in a dream is one of the most promising dreams for the loss of sadness and anxiety, and portends psychological comfort. Below we show the most important interpretations. Seeing sea sand in a dream. A dream means happiness and peace of mind. Seeing sand in a dream symbolizes the end of crises and problems. The vision also indicates that the dreamer will receive large sums of money. While one sees that he is walking on sand in a dream, it warns the dreamer that he is under pressure during the coming period. If An unmarried woman saw sand in her dream, as this is a sign of her approaching marriage. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of seeing walking on sand in a dream Walking on sand varies depending on the ability of the dreamer to walk on it, and the most prominent of these interpretations are the following. If the dreamer faces difficulty in walking On sand in a dream, the vision indicates problems and worries that fall on the dreamer’s shoulders. While walking easily on sand in a dream, it heralds the achievement of the dreamer’s goals and aspirations. A man walking on a lot of sand in a dream indicates that he will give birth to many, and God knows best. As for sitting On the sand of the sea, it is a sign of comfort, peace, and reassurance that the dreamer will feel in his life. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing yourself collecting sand in a dream. Collecting sand in a dream, the dreamer may see it and think that it is just a passing dream, but it carries many meanings from it. Collecting an amount A large pile of sand in a dream means that you will earn a lot of money. A man carries a lot of sand on his back, so this is a sign that he is earning money after getting tired and putting in a lot of effort at work. As for collecting money from someone else’s land in a dream, it indicates greed. The dreamer and his dissatisfaction. The previous vision also warns that the dreamer is looking at what others have. Interpretation of seeing sand in one dream. An unmarried girl who sees sand in a dream is interested in knowing the meaning of what she sees, especially if she expects a certain thing to happen, and among the interpretations of this vision are the following Sand in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates comfort and achieving planned goals. Walking easily on the sand in a dream is a sign that the girl will overcome the difficulties she is going through. As for her dream of sleeping on the sand, it is a sign that the girl’s wedding is approaching. Falling in the sand indicates Moving indicates the presence of a problem that she faces. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream for a married woman. A married woman loves to know the interpretation of the dreams she sees, and to know what the vision brings in terms of evil meanings, promising or otherwise, and among the interpretations of seeing sand. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Magic brings many meanings of good and evil to the vision, as it is interpreted as a source of livelihood and goodness from a permissible source, and perhaps in some places, the vision is good news for the arrival of goodness and happiness for its people. A house like Ibn Sirin’s explanation of decoding magic for envy and great evil and getting rid soon, and in this article you have the most important and important good and evil situations for magic in a man’s and woman’s dream.Interpretation of magic in a dream for a single womanIf single people see that it is a magical act, it is an obscene or immoral interpretation and explanation. Also, all passers-by hate it when a fortuneteller bewitches a person in a dream to influence him. It has been said that magic indicates mischief, turmoil and turmoil. Whoever sees this among unmarried girls in her position must ask God for forgiveness and remove from her thoughts all negative thoughts, and must especially get rid of envy, hatred, and hatred of others, even if they have been harmed. If an unmarried woman dreams that someone is bewitching her by wearing jeans, or chanting an incantation Magic, or puts something disgusting in her food, or in the folds of her bed, or in her clothes...her. Perhaps the vision indicated that this person seeks to harm or harm her. Some girls mistakenly believe that they want to be charmed or touched simply because of a dream seen in a dream. In fact, it is not so simple, because dreams often depict scenes created by our subconscious, and our beliefs are also responsible for the depiction of our dreams, but we do not need to consider the appearance of the dream as much as we examine it. In its symbolic meaning. Interpretation of magic in a dream for a married woman: Magic is disliked in a woman’s dream, whether she sees it in her dreams as if she did it or sees it as if someone is watching her. It is primarily an indication of rebellion and impulse. It also indicates infidelity, corruption, immorality and major sins. Witchcraft in a married woman’s dream never refers to herself as much as it refers to similar actions such as committing sins, and witchcraft also refers to a crime that requires severe punishment. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is bewitching her husband by putting something unpleasant or strange in his food, then when the subject wakes up it is an order. Horrific that offends her husband or harms him and loses him. If a married woman sees that she has been bewitched or sees someone putting strange things in her food, such as insects, frogs, turtles and the like... This vision shows the existence of a conspiracy and deception that the dreamer can carry out to expose someone he saw in the dream as if he were Bewitched by her. Magic in a married woman’s dream portends evil and evil, especially if she imagines in a vision that she is a witch or a jinn witch. Such dreams are a clear warning against the assumption that she must cover reservations and concealment in matters related to her family life, especially marriage. Interpretation of magic in a dream of a divorced woman: Magic in a dream of divorce and widowhood indicates sadness or sorrow. It's a bad interpretation. If a divorced woman or a widow sees herself casting spells on her in her dream, she will wake up from anxiety or problems. As for a divorced woman or a widow who sees in her dream that she is performing magic through strange incantations and incantations, the dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about bathing a dead person

preview.html: In this article from our interpretive website, we will learn together about many of the details and different interpretive cases of this dream, so stay with us. Interpretation of a vision of a single girl bathing the dead in a dream. Seeing a dead person bathing in an unmarried girl’s dream. Evidence that her call for mercy and forgiveness was heard, God willing, and that The dead person is blessed in his grave, and God knows best. It is her dead mother washing in a dream. It is one of the visions that express joy and happiness and makes things easier in the dreamer’s life, God willing. To bathe the unknown dead person and wrap him in a dream. Among the unpleasant visions, it portends that the dreamer will be exposed For something sad in the coming days, and God knows best. A dead person bathes in a dream while he is alive in reality. This is evidence that this person will reach a high position among people. Bathing an unmarried girl in a dream is evidence of the kindness of her heart, the purity of her intentions, her purity, and her closeness to God. Almighty. If she is bathing while wearing her clothes in a dream, it is good that she will soon marry a good, well-born man. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for food. Interpretation of seeing a corpse bathing in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees one of her parents dead as if they were bathing in a dream. And she It is a gesture from God that she should respond to her prayers for them and accept her charity for them, God willing. Washing the dead in a married woman’s dream foretells that she will ease her worries and get rid of her troubles and sorrows soon, especially if the water is lukewarm or hot, and God knows best. Using hot water to wash the dead represents committing a crime. Sins. As for cold water, it indicates the many disputes and disagreements that exist between the dreamer and the family of the deceased. A woman bathing with her clothes in a dream is good news for the fulfillment of an old, long-awaited dream or desire, and God knows best. Whoever bathes with her husband in a dream will enjoy a married life full of affection, understanding, and psychological comfort. And stability. Interpretation of seeing a dead person bathing in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a dead person bathing in hot water in a man’s dream. To expose the deceased’s family and his family to great troubles for the sake of money and inheritance, and God knows best. And whoever sees in a dream that he is washing one of his deceased relatives. He always prays for their dead, and often He visits their graves and gives them alms. When a man sees in a dream, it is like bathing the mother of the deceased. It is a sign of relief from his worries, freedom from problems and worries, and stability of his financial situation. Washing the dead in a dream with cold water is undesirable. Which indicates the emergence of problems In the work of a fortune teller, he may be subject to a fine and a financial deduction. When a person sees in his dream that he is bathing in the street in front of people, God makes him a pilgrimage to His Holy House, and God knows best. Read also: The interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream is sick. The meaning of seeing a drowning corpse in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Says Ibn Sirin Bathing a dead mother in a pregnant woman’s dream is an expression of God’s forgiveness and mercy, and it is the worship of believers, and God knows best. Bathing a dead mother in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that the dreamer was fair with her mother, both alive and dead. He always prays for her.

title: More than 100 interpretations of the dream of drinking milk in detail in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk in a dream: Drinking milk is very important for maintaining healthy bones and the body in general, and a person must ensure that he consumes it regularly, as long as there is nothing preventing him, but what about seeing it in a dream? What are the indications that this vision aims at? We will learn this through the many interpretations received from him according to the various details. Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk in a dream: Seeing him drinking milk in a dream is one of the visions that bring a lot of goodness and blessings to the dreamer’s wealth and children if he is married. A girl who sees in her dream and feels sad or anxious Because of a failure in an emotional relationship or a loss of any kind, but this sadness will not last long and soon she will get over it and take care of her future and occupy it. Her mind was only of the blessings that God had given her and for which she was worthy of gratitude. It is enough to give us the blessing of forgetfulness so that people can continue their lives. If a young man sees that he has a bowl of fresh milk in front of him, then his vision is evidence that he will marry a virgin girl of good reputation whose morals are not impure. He will propose to her and marry her very soon, and happiness will enter his heart after he lost her and was confused before. In general, seeing it is evidence of a change in the dreamer’s life for the better, and that he will experience a series of happy events in his life. It also expresses the goodness of the dreamer’s heart and does not hide any hatred and envy. From a person, even if there are disagreements between them, he is well-intentioned with everyone, but in any person he must be careful and cautious, so as not to fall victim to one of the evil people who can exploit him and harm him. . Drinking milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: The connotations of drinking milk are all positive as long as it is fit for drinking, but if it spoils, they are negative. If the dreamer drinks cow’s milk and tastes its good taste, then his vision is evidence that God Almighty will bless him for the rest of his life, even if He was poor, and he provided for himself from his endless generosity. As for the seer, who was originally blessed with wealth and consumed it, he is a person who serves everyone without expecting reward except from God Almighty, and he enjoys a good story among the people who turn to him in their hardships, and those who find them. Taking care of their affairs and helping them meet their needs. As for his corruption in the dreamer’s dream, it may be evidence of his incompetence in his religion and the corruption of his morals, and he must beware that life for a moment may end without his knowledge, and he will meet our Lord. With all this. So repent and then repent before it is too late. Drinking milk in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing drinking milk in a single woman’s dream: Pure, pure milk is evidence of the purity of his bed and the goodness of his origin, and that he enjoys a good reputation and a fragrant reputation among men. Interpretation of the dream of drinking milk for unmarried women, if it tastes good Sweet, evidence of her happiness with the future husband she chooses based on his reputation and religious commitment. If she finds it stressful and corrupting, she may fall prey to a cunning person who takes advantage of her naivety and kindness and gets her into a lot of trouble. She needs to take care of herself and not allow anyone to control her or take advantage of her. For her. If she is an educated girl and wants to...

Interpretation of a dream about my husband going and leaving me in a dream. Seeing a husband going and leaving his wife in a dream may indicate some changes occurring in their lives during this time, and God knows best. It is possible. To see the husband leaving and abandoning his wife in a dream, this could be a sign of disappointment and disconnection during that period. If the woman sees that her husband has abandoned her and entered the dream, this may indicate his inability to achieve his goals and aspirations, and God knows best. Seeing the husband leaving in the dream The dream could indicate the many disagreements and problems that exist between them in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband teaching me to drive a car in a dream. In the event that a woman sees that her husband is teaching her to drive in a dream, this may indicate that she is a very controlling personality and that God knows best. It may indicate Dreaming of a husband teaching a woman to drive indicates that he trusts her to make some important decisions inside the house. Anyone who dreams that her husband was teaching her how to drive a car in a dream may indicate her authority inside the house and her control over matters. Seeing a husband teaching a woman to drive a car in a dream may indicate Real knowledge that a woman can gain, and God knows best. If they see a husband without clothes in a dream, this may be a sign of some disturbances occurring in their lives during this period and they must seek God’s help. Dreaming of a naked husband in a dream may indicate some family problems that occur between them during this period. Time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a cradle in a dream - Seeing a cradle in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Seeing the cradle or the cradle for the single woman, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, riding up the falls, breaking the rope and more by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Abdullah. True: Seeing a hammock in a dream. Seeing a hammock in a dream reflects the dreamer’s perceived desire for adventure and discovering new things. This dream symbolizes the dreamer’s liberation from the problems and fears that he suffers from in reality, and his liberation from the negative energy and emotions that have taken over his life. Falling from a hammock in a dream indicates Wrong decisions made by its owner negatively affect his life. A single woman who sees a hammock in her dream symbolizes her need to be careful and calls on her to make rational and sound decisions. When an unmarried woman rides a hammock in her dream, this foretells positive changes that she will experience on several levels. For a married woman, if she dreams that she is swinging in a place full of children, this indicates that she will soon become pregnant. If a pregnant woman sees a hammock in her dream, this is a sign of the approaching due date. Whoever sees the return of the cradle is playing with his debt. Cradle: Whoever sees himself swinging on it The corruption of his faith in his religion appears from a dream that he is in the cradle. He has lost his religion and does not know what to do. Volatility is a reflection of the reality that a person experiences in his life, of the rise or fall of matter or emotions. Volatility is a symbol and connotation that expresses the desire for adventure and departure, or the release of worries, depression, and the expulsion of feelings. Negativity. Refers to the happiness that befalls him as a result of a happy event or news sometimes. Swing: made of a rope, and if he sees himself swinging on it, then he is corrupt in his religion and playing with it. Falling from a swing in a dream refers to wrong decisions made by the monarch that cause him bad consequences. And a bad cradle in one's dream. Seeing a swing in a dream and dreaming of a single or unmarried woman is a sign and a message that one should be careful, because a single swing in a swing indicates instability or falling and limping, and it has a negative connotation that it symbolizes completely irrational behavior, especially if the swing is at work Or study. A single girl riding a swing in her dream in a place full of play, joy, and fun, such as an amusement park or garden, reflects positive change in her life, especially if the swing is accompanied by a feeling of joy, laughter, and happiness because it heralds happy news. Seeing a single woman as if she were floating in a dream with a man Or a stranger, it can indicate the presence of a relationship or the creation of a new friendship and relationship. In general, swinging with a strange man in an unmarried girl’s dream is news and a reflection of her good luck. Cradle in a married dream As for a married woman, seeing her cradle in a public place or a surrounded park With children in a dream indicates the birth of many children, and a cradle in a married woman’s dream may foretell her pregnancy and good tidings when she sees her in playgrounds and parks. Seeing a swing at work is not good and does not bode well because it indicates a loss of security and instability.

Cradle in a single dream Seeing a swing in a dream and a dream of a single or unmarried woman is a sign and a message that caution must be exercised, because the individual swing in the swing indicates instability or falling and zigzag, and it has a negative connotation that it symbolizes completely irrational behavior, especially if the swing is at work or study. A single girl riding a swing in her dream in a place full of play, joy and fun, such as amusement parks or parks, reflects a positive change in her life, especially if the swing is accompanied by a feeling of joy, laughter and happiness because it heralds good news. Seeing a single woman as if she is floating in a dream with a man or a stranger, can indicate a relationship Or create a new friendship and relationship, and in general, swinging with a strange man in an unmarried girl’s dream is considered news and a reflection of her good luck. Cradle in a married woman’s dream As for a married woman, seeing her cradle in a public place or garden surrounded by children in a dream indicates the birth of many children, and the cradle in a married woman’s dream may foretell her pregnancy and good tidings when she sees it in playgrounds and gardens. Seeing a swing at work is not good and does not bode well because it indicates a loss of security and instability
